data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Peravia, Dominican Republic to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Peravia, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 18,416 believers in the state of Peravia to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Peravia, Dominican Republic.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Peravia to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, 0.5% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, convict the 18,416 believers in Peravia to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Peravia.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Peravia, Dominican Republic has a population of 169,900.

We estimate Peravia has 18,416 people who might know Jesus, 140,938 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 10,546 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Peravia, Dominican Republic to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
